headline: Earnings to Watch This Week
summary: Corporate earnings season takes off this week with U.S. banks led by JPMorgan Chase. Big companies outside of finance including Johnson & Johnson, Netflix and PepsiCo are also on the way. Here are the highlights of who is reporting, and the expected approximate release times.

headline: Food stock turmoil: Innovation is key for major food companies
summary: Consumers are shifting away from traditional packaged foods, pressuring Big Food companies like PepsiCo (PEP) and Kraft Heinz (KHC) to innovate or face continued volume declines. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma, Lafayette College chief investment officer Krishna Memani, and Marketgauge.com chief strategist Michele Schneider join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to explain how shifting consumer habits and innovation will shape the future of big food. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.
